CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C01

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по ремонт и поддържане на асансьори

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Treasury and Payments Department, 9 Prescott Street

TITLE.P: Barts Health NHS Trust — Lift Maintenance Procurement

SHORT_DESCR.P: The tender is for the provision of a fully comprehensive lift maintenance and reactive call out and repair service at Whipps Cross University Hospital, Mile End Hospital and Newham University Hospital. The Contract will run for an initial period of 1 year and then for a further 2 years subject to the contractor providing the required high level of maintenance and call out coverage during the first year period to the full satisfaction of Barts Health NHS Trust.

MAIN_SITE.P: Whipps Cross University Hospital, Whipps Cross Road, Leytonstone, London, E11 1NR.
Mile End Hospital, Bancroft Road, London E1 4DG.
Newham University Hospital, Glen Road, Plaistow, London, E13 8SL.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The tender is for the provision of a fully comprehensive lift maintenance and reactive call out and repair service at Whipps Cross University Hospital, Mile End Hospital and Newham University Hospitals.

The contractor should provide evidence with their tender of their ability to deliver high quality lift maintenance to Barts Health NHS Trust and any value added services they provide i.e. data pens / PDAs, smart phones, web based systems with real time information.

The contractor should provide evidence with their tender of their technical ability to maintain Barts Health NHS Trust’s lift equipment, including stock of spare parts, obtaining replacement parts and ability to offer alternative solutions.

The contractor shall provide information of how the contract will be managed including the location of the office, management team, supervisory team, technical support and number of engineers to be appointed to the contract including training of personnel.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contract will run for an initial period of 1 year and then for a further 2 years subject to the contractor providing the required high level of maintenance and call out coverage during the first year period to the full satisfaction of Barts Health NHS Trust.

SUITABILITY.P: Lift and Escalator Industry Association (LEIA) or European Elevator Association Required.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Price: the tenderer offering the lowest priced option will receive the full score, remaining offers are scored by dividing the lowest price by the quoted price then multiplied by the weighed score — 40 %.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Quality: the contractor shall provide evidence of their ability to deliver high quality lift maintenance to the Barts Health NHS Trust — 20 %.
Technical ability: the contractor shall provide evidence of their technical ability to maintain the Barts Health NHS Trust’s equipment — 20 %.
Contract management: the contractor shall provide evidence of the management team and the adequacy of their numbers — 20 %.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Evaluations of quality, technical management and contract management will be scored as follows:

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Barts Health NHS Trust requires that a number of key performance indicators are included as part of this maintenance contract, the following area shall be measured with the minimum performance levels stated:
— maintenance: 100 % of planned maintenance visits completed by the due date,
— call outs: a minimum of 95 % of calls reached within the notified response time,
— first time fix: a minimum of 90 % of call outs, repaired on initial call out visit,
— 5 day fix: a minimum of 98 % of repairs where parts are required following a call out, shall be completed and the lift returned to service within five working days of the initial call out,

— thorough examination reports: 100 % of items identified on the Lifting Operations and Lifting Equipment Regulation 1998 Through Examination Report (Insurance Report) that are covered under the scope of the contract completed within either the timed defect period or 4 working weeks from the date of notification.

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: The review procedure will be undertaken by the Procurement team of Barts Health NHS Trust.
